name: Fio.cz v2 - orange compact
description: This style affects internet banking Fio.cz ver. 2, theme version 1.6
additional_info:
Theme version 1.6 (2018-01-10)
Fixed tooltip over points in a graph. The tooltip is now moved up (and left) so if the tooltip has 2 rows then the tooltip remains visible.

Theme version 1.5 (2016-06-27)
Too wide Account name (Information about account) - min width is 200px (instead of 340px).

Theme version 1.4 (2015-08-17)
Drop down menu for custom search settings in Pohyby na účtu has width 780px (instead of 1140px).

Theme version 1.2 (2015-05-11)
1.3 changes reverted back - the problem solved with 1.3 is on old Opera only, on other browsers works 1.2 version OK.

Theme version 1.3 (2015-04-29)
Edit note buttons moved outside textbox

Theme version 1.2 (2015-04-08)
Redirect to IB1 -> orange

Theme version 1.1 (2015-01-20)
Compact layout improved
Message width shrinked

Thene version 1.0 (2015-01-15)
Green colour changed to orange.
Compact style - smaller paddings and fontsize.
Minimum width 800px (instead of 1200 px).
Minimum width for .pohyby 950 px.
